entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Burgeo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:56 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burgeo 6:30 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: 6.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 5.8°C
Wind: ENE 47 km/h gust 59 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Rain or drizzle. Fog developing early this evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle early in the evening. Showers or drizzle beginning in the evening. Fog. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023
